mapper.select: SELECT C.CLS_IDX, C.CLS_NAME, C.CLS_CONTENT, C.CLS_IMAGE1, C.CLS_PRICE, C.CLS_STARTDATE, C.CLS_ENDDATE, C.TEACHER_ID, C.CLS_LOCATION, C.CLS_IMAGE2, C.CLS_IMAGE3, B.NAME, B.PHONE FROM CLS C FULL OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON C.TEACHER_ID = B.ID WHERE C.TEACHER_ID = 'teacher'

SELECT C.CLS_IDX, C.CLS_NAME, C.CLS_CONTENT, C.CLS_IMAGE1, C.CLS_PRICE, C.CLS_STARTDATE, C.CLS_ENDDATE, C.TEACHER_ID, C.CLS_LOCATION, C.CLS_IMAGE2, C.CLS_IMAGE3, B.NAME, B.PHONE FROM CLS C FULL OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON C.TEACHER_ID = B.ID WHERE CLS_IDX = #{cls_idx}

SELECT C.CLS_IDX, C.CLS_NAME, C.CLS_CONTENT, C.CLS_IMAGE1, C.CLS_PRICE, C.CLS_STARTDATE, C.CLS_ENDDATE, C.TEACHER_ID, C.CLS_LOCATION, C.CLS_IMAGE2, C.CLS_IMAGE3, B.ID, B.PWD, B.NAME, B.PHONE, B.ADDR FROM CLS C FULL OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON C.TEACHER_ID = B.ID WHERE CLS_IDX = #{cls_idx}
